title:
DIRECTIONS: Chop cauliflower then add to a food processor and pulse until rice-like consistency.
In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower and the lemon juice and stir well.
In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower and the lemon juice and stir well. Add the olive oil and the parsley, green onions, tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Stir well.
Taste and add more salt and pepper if needed.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, stirring once each hour.
directions: Chop cauliflower then add to a food processor and pulse until rice-like consistency.
In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower and the lemon juice and stir well.
In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower and the lemon juice and stir well. Add the olive oil and the parsley, green onions, tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Taste and add more salt and pepper if needed.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, stirring once each hour.
ingredients: 1 bunch parsley, washed and chopped (leaves only)
